pages.text: The $(mob)Kikimora$() is a helper monster that spawns on the surface in Icy Taigas in the $(thing)Overworld$(). It is passive, and will not attack players unless attacked first, after which it will strike with simple melee attacks. $(mob)Kikimora$() can sometimes spawn holding a $(item)Broom$().
$(mob)Kikimora$() drop $(item)Fur$() on death, which can be smelted in a furnace to create $(item)Leather$()

$(mob)Kikimora$() drop $(item)Iron Box$() on death, which can be right-clicked while in hand to open and receive a random tool, weapon, or armor piece made of iron. Alternatively, it can be smelted in a furnace to create $(item)Crystalized Experience (Small)$().
